评论详情: These pants were a gift for my granddaughter and she loved them! Fit true to size ! The pants hold their shape,  the fabric is a good weight and it doesn’t lose its shape, even after washing them!  My granddaughter was thrilled with them!
My daughter loves the weight and length of these sweatpants. She also loves the wide leg at the bottom. Flattering and comfortable!
I was a little sad that these are not fleece. The material is still nice and thick though and the garment is well made. The sizing is accurate.

评论概述: So Ugly. Not tall girl friendly
评论详情: These are some of the worst sweatpants I’ve ever tried. The material is *somewhat* thick but they’re just so ugly lol. I’m 5’9 and these are not long enough if you plan to wear them high waisted. Barely long enough for low rise.
Love these! They are great quality, fit true to size and good value! Ordering more, as they are my new fave sweatpants!
These sweatpants are super comfortable and great quality! Fits true to size and they look just like the photos.

I picked these up for my wife, and she loves how comfortable they are. The wide-leg fit gives them a relaxed, casual look, and the fabric is soft and breathable. She’s worn them for lounging at home and running errands, and they work well for both.  The only issue is the length—they run quite long, so hemming might be necessary if you’re on the shorter side. Aside from that, they’re a cozy and stylish addition to her wardrobe.

They fit well, they move well with you, very comfortable.  They are for cooler temperatures, I think they would be hot in 70F plus temps. They wrinkle so bad.  You think, maybe a quick iron after washing?  Nope, any bend in the legs and there are wrinkles everywhere.
Warm… fit … ok needs to be adjusted every now and then.

These are made of Super soft material. They are the perfect lounge pant. They dry quickly wising away sweat. They are so comfortable. They are great fitting and they aren't tight. They are great for jogging and comfortable enough for lounging. They run true to size. The pockets are nice and deep too. I would recommend these.
I liked the weight of the fabric and the style. The waist is smallish which suits me fine but might be uncomfortable for women who carry weight in their waist.
Love these! I’m short (5’4 & 130lbs- Medium) and it’s hard to find pants that don’t drag, these do not if I flip once at the top and if I wear thick soled shoes. Buying another in black!
Excellent quality, soft, perfect fit.

These have been enjoyable to wear..I did shorten them a bit though to make them more stylish and wear them with fun boots  The material is warm and heavier than usual sweatpants so ideal to wear in fall and winter
Love  them. warm soft and so Comfortable

评论概述: Super Comfortable and Stylish - Perfect for the Y2K Look!
评论详情: These Trendy Queen Wide Leg Sweatpants are everything I hoped for! They’re incredibly comfortable with a soft, cozy material that’s perfect for cooler fall days. The high-waisted fit is super flattering, and the wide leg gives them that trendy Y2K vibe that’s so popular right now.  They’re roomy and baggy in just the right way, making them perfect for lounging, running errands, or styling up with a cute crop top for going out. The quality is great, and they hold their shape well even after washing. If you’re into the relaxed, trendy look, these joggers are a fantastic choice. Highly recommend!
Sweats are very comfy and great for lounging

These sweatpants are extremely comfortable! I love the way they fit! The size chart is accurate and so is the description provided. The materials used are better than expected. The material is thick and the stitching is seems to be nicely done with no hanging or loose threads. They're easily cleaned. I machine wash my pants in cool or warm water and dry on the medium setting like I usually do. I haven't noticed any shrinkage. I'm truly satisfied with my purchase! Great value for what I spent and I highly recommend!
Super comfy and great dupes!
These are just okay - the fabric feels slightly cheap, but they are fine.

I should have ordered up at least one size. I barely got them over my thighs which isn't usually an issue with sweatpants. The pockets were really small. They have a drawstring, but there wasn't any point at all in using that. Not a fan at all.

These are cute sweatpants, and I love the color! They are a good middle weight, perfect for staying warm on a cool day but not overly hot. I don’t sweat in them but I do stay warm outside.  Fit is average, like most discount store sweats. Straight legs, good waistband with nice quality elastic that is tacked down so it doesn’t roll. I’m tall (5’10”) and they are long enough. Not super long but enough that I don’t feel like they look short.  I removed one star because of the fabric itself. The inside is a rough texture. They are sort of like a slightly stretchy terrycloth but the loops are not super comfy against your skin. I like soft sweats and, while the fabric is soft and flexible, I wish the inside was softer and smoother.  Overall, a decent pair of sweats for a reasonable price in a super cute color!

评论概述: These are not the pants I received
评论详情: Super disappointed. I really liked the style shown but what I got were a simple pair of drawstring sweats with no pockets and elastic bottoms at the ankle. To boot, the legs are different lengths! I'll still wear them but they aren't what I thought I was getting.
Great length for L for 5’5 gal

These sweatpants are simply awesome!  As a millennial I have wanted to try something a little on the baggier side to start moving away from the tight joggers and leggings I have in order to feel a bit trendier.  I love the high waist and flare leg- it not only feels stylish but also is crazy comfortable (and I thought leggings were the epitome of comfort!).  The material is thick but not overwhelmingly so.  The inside is soft and comfortable against the skin (though I do feel it could be softer). I got them in a classic grey and I may go back and get them in a black or the black/grey too just since I love them so much.  Either way, I highly recommend!
These pants were super soft and fit to size! They are super cute they are thin but that’s what I expected!

The fabric was very nice, true to size.  Unfortunately they fit awkwardly on my 5'8" frame and the pockets were too small (iPhone wouldn't stay in them).  I just couldn't see these being one of my go-to sweats.  Returned.
would recommend

评论概述: Excellent all around wide leg pants - a solid performer - plus it looks great!
评论详情: Overall: Recommended! Great to wear. Stylish and with a great fit these seem durable and well made. Flowy kind of fit is very comfortable and roomy. Cheers

It is not an exaggeration to say that I have hardly taken these off since I received these. These are perfect for both lounging around the house and for running errands. They are extremely comfortable, soft, and hold their form even after being washed.  They’re extremely flattering as well. I get compliments if I do wear them out of the house. My 11-year-old niece said “wow those are cute. I want some!” Which is honestly the highest compliment! A great find. I’m gonna be ordering a few more pairs to have on hand
Adorable!  Comfortable! Soft! Get them in every color!

I LOVE these. These sweatpants are so cute and comfy! They're really flattering and feel great to wear. They are a bit long for petite girls—I'm 5 ft tall, and they do drag on the ground a little, but I don’t mind too much. The price is great too, so I’m thinking about getting a few more pairs. Love them!

These are comfortable, true to size, not warm, but breezy material. Quality, it is mostly 66% polyester, but feel more cotton-like. They looked okay. I liked the fashion band at the top, but they were too short. Thankfully, these are short, but proportionate. But I can't wear there, looks too silly on me. I pulled them up, for the high waist, but I think they would be more flattering on a shorter individual.  These can tighten by the strings and have medium sized pockets.  Great comfy house pants.

These wide leg sweat pants are very comfortable.  I got the XL and they fit me big, but I like my sweats to fit a little big.  I will say, I am 4'11 and they are extra long on me, but they are still wearable.  I fold the top elastic a few times and go on with my day. These are great sweats to step out and run a few errands because they are very comfortable.
Love love love these pants. The fabric is nice and holds its shape, the color is a deep black and there’s pockets!  The sizing is perfect. I’m considering wearing these as a dress pant. Really.

I have trouble finding pants that fit my waist, are long enough and aren’t too tight. These pants are amazing! I have more around the middle and they aren’t tight, high waisted to hide all the baby belly, they are the perfect length and they are fitted but not tight. I will be buying a back up pair AND more colors!

These pants are nice looking and comfortable.  I like the soft, smooth feel of the outer material.  It's attractive and quality look and feel.  The inside of the pants has a slight nubby feel to the material but is still comfortable.  The pockets are nice and deep.  The hem is double-stitched and the elastic waist is strong with no need to tie (of course, I have a large waist-line).  I bought a size medium since I'm 5'3" and weigh 145 lbs.  The only trouble is that the pant legs are 3-inches too long.  That's not unusual though and I'll just have to hem them.  These are very nice pants, and warm too.
The material is thick and so comfortable to wear. Its color is exactly like ad photos. I love how big their pockets are. The size is perfect. They're not really stretchy but it doesn't bother me.

评论概述: Comfortable, but too long for me
评论详情: Too long for me since I'm 5'1.5 ish and 110 pounds. Even if I pull them all the way up to my waist, past my stomach it's still too long. Not surprised, but it is comfortable, probably good for taller people with longer legs.  They look alright, pretty much same as description, but they are kinda ballooned shaped on me. Maybe it's just my body type.

I love how these sweatpants fit. They're the perfect length for my 32" inseam and they're not really baggy. I'm in between sizes so I ordered a L. They have a comfortable elastic waist and an inner drawstring, and large pockets. The material isn't fleece, but it's a soft flat-woven fabric that I find very comfortable. They have some style to them with  some seams on the sides so I would actually wear them out of the house, too. They're well made, cute, and comfortable, and perfect for cooler temps.

These wide leg sweatpants are very cute with a great diagonal front seam as a fashion statement. They have a high waist which I really love and the wide legs are both trendy and super comfy.  These pants fit really well and the colors are great. The only thing I am not a great fan of is the weight of the pants. I don’t mean how think the fabric is but the actual weight. They are very heavy! I will still wear them as they are super cute, but they are heavier than any other sweatpants I own. The pants are well made and seem high quality.

I usually wear a size 2L in jeans. I am 5'7" with most of my height from my legs. I ordered these in a small. They are just barely long enough if I sit the waistband on my natural waist. I wish they were a quarter of an inch longer. They are also more baggy in the rear than what I would have liked. I think the XS would have fit my rear better but they would have been too short then. They are comfortable. They just didn't fit me like I had hoped from the product picture (slimmer in rear and hips and wider in leg.) They fit me kind of baggy everywhere. If you are on the shorter side and don't need the length, I would size down. If you are taller, do not size down.

I was looking for a pair of comfortable sweatpants to use for errands.  Perfect fit right out of the package! These are medium weight and are good for spring and fall, but too light for winter and too heavy for summer. The waist is 28". I haven't washed them yet but will use warm water and dry on medium heat. I want these to last.

I’m 5’11 and these are long enough. I washed them and let them air dry. I stretched them a little too while they were still wet. They were still long enough before I did that. I ordered up to a medium for length I probably didn’t need to do that. They aren’t fleecy comfortable. I wish they were. They are kind of a heavier material good for Fall/ beginning of Winter. They have a drawstring. They are overall okay.
These were exactly as pictured. Fit true to size and super comfortable. Very soft, cozy, and big pockets!

评论概述: You won't want to take them off...
评论详情: As soon as these arrived, I tried them on, and I don't want to take them off!  They fit well, elasticized waist is comfortable, also have a drawstring inside the waistband, good-sized pockets on both sides, and open (non-elasticized) at the bottom.I am 5'6" 145# with wide hips, often between size M and size L. I went with L and it is perfect - roomy, long enough in the leg, but not overly baggy.  They might run short on tall ladies (and maybe too long for ladies under 5'4", although that is pretty easily fixed).  Fabric is more on the lightweight side, and the inside is a flat woven surface rather than a fuzzy/fleecy surface.  But they feel really good on.  I am very pleased with them.

These are nice, quality sweatpants. The material is thick and they seem well made. There are both elastic and drawstrings (internal) for the waist which is perfect for adjusting the fit. They seem a little long in length- which is good for taller people, but since they are open bottomed legs (i.e. not joggers with elastic on the hem) they may need to be hemmed for shorter people. Regardless, these are really nice sweatpants.
